original_title: Howard Hughes: The Great Aviator - His Life, Loves & FIlms
overview: Explore the public and private life of one of the 20th Century's most important Americans. The legacy of Howard Hughes is both inspirational and tragic. Gain insight into the motivations of this complex man through a rare interviews and footage.
title: Howard Hughes: The Great Aviator - His Life, Loves & FIlms
